description: Applies the Arabic normalizer to normalize orthography.
Strips all characters after an apostrophe (including the apostrophe itself).
Converts non-ASCII characters into their ASCII equivalents, if possible.
Forms bigrams of CJK terms generated from the standard tokenizer.
Normalizes CJK width differences.
Removes English possessives, and dots from acronyms.
Constructs bigrams for frequently occurring terms while indexing.
Generates edge n-grams of the given size(s).
Removes elisions (e.g., l'avion -> avion).
Normalizes German characters according to heuristics.
Normalizes Hindi text to reduce spelling variations.
Normalizes Unicode representation of Indian languages.
Emits each incoming token twice (keyword and non-keyword).
High-performance kstem filter for English.
Removes words that are too long or too short.
Limits the number of tokens while indexing.
Normalizes token text to lower case.
Generates n-grams of the given size(s).
Applies normalization for Persian.
Creates tokens for phonetic matches.
Uses the Porter stemming algorithm.
Reverses the token string.
Normalizes interchangeable Scandinavian characters.
Folds Scandinavian characters to ASCII equivalents and de-duplicates double vowels.
Creates combinations of tokens as a single token.
Stems words using a Snowball-generated stemmer.
Normalizes Unicode representation of Sorani text.
Language specific stemming filter.
Removes stop words from a token stream.
Trims leading and trailing whitespace from tokens.
Truncates terms to a specific length.
Filters out tokens with same text as the previous token.

Splits words into subwords and optionally transforms subword groups.
